mean_en: a formal or official account of facts or opinions; something that you say or write that gives information or an opinion
sentence: The company made a statement confirming that the couple will no longer work with them.
sentence_trans: 这家公司宣布这对情侣已被辞退。
word_etyma: state陈述 + ment表名词 → 站着说话 → statement声明立场
